text_block_list.text: ―Rewinding time a bit, to before the Selection Race…

It was my day off. Walking along the riverbank, 
I spotted Eishin Flash training. But…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
— Haa… haa… 
It is time for a break ―

It looks like she's been training pretty hard. From the pained 
expression on her face, I could tell she was exhausted.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Ha… phew… 
Break time is over…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Haah… Next up—
choice_data_list: You should rest a little longer…!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ……? And you are…?

I introduced myself as a trainer at Tracen Academy and 
attempted to tell her she looked like she still needed rest, but—

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No… haa. …It will not prove a hindrance. 
Short breaks are part of my regimen.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Fatigue is expected around 3 pm today — that is, right now. 
I can catch my breath in the 30 minute break coming up.

It sounds like she has absolute confidence in her regimen 
and is adamant about sticking to it. However…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, I keep a margin. For example, this chat with you has 
caused a 4 minute and 25 second delay…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, that's fine. I can simply subtract it from my next 
five-minute break to get back on track.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I know full well I'm pushing it a little. 
But I put together a tight regimen to my goal 
and it leaves me less time to spare than usual.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Completing this regimen is a top priority. 
If not…—

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
… 5 minutes and 45 seconds have passed. 
I can't lose any more time, so if you'll excuse me…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
… I forgot to mention. 
Thank you for your concern. Well then.
Eishin Flash is really putting in the effort for her next race… But I should say, I get the feeling she's trying too hard.

For sure, the Selection Races are important, but there are 
several opportunities throughout the year. 
As I pondered why she was so set on debuting right now—

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Good～ day～ to～ you～～ ☆ 
Can Falko have a little chat?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
— Falko. I'm sharing a room with Flash. 
So I know she's working reeaaally hard right now.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
… Fufu. Of course! 
Please keep this off-record, okay?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Flash's parents are coming from Germany 
to watch the upcoming Selection Race!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Flash's parents own a popular cake shop, right? They're super 
busy, so Flash-san is really excited they're coming over.

I now understood the reason for her efforts and why she'd want to 
stake it all on this race. That said, even if it's for her 
development, why does she so adhere to her regimen so much?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: At any rate, that's all Falco can say right now, I think?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Iiit's because… something hit me like beepbeep! I guess ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
When I saw you two talking, I thought you looked like… 
You would understand the good things about Flash-san ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
You've taken an interest in Flash-san, right? 
… So make sure you watch over her ☆

— The day before the Selection Race. I walked around the 
academy, pondering the meaning of Smart Falcon's words…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Toi toi toi…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
…… 
Ah… you… we met the other day……

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … It's a German spell that I learned from my parents.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Tap the desk three times while repeating "toi toi toi…". 
The sound is said to ward off evil and protect from bad luck.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It may just be superstition, but I want to ensure 
that nothing unplanned happens tomorrow…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
… That's not really it. Tomorrow, my parents will take time 
out of their busy schedule to come and watch the race.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Doing the right job correctly will lead to perfect results. 
Demonstrating that is my obligation as their daughter.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Because I'm certain they would be highly disappointed if 
I was to… miss expectations and register a miserable result…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … What do you mean by that?

I don't know much about her, much less her parents. 
But anyone who sees her run can tell 
that she is a very hard worker.
choice_data_list: I think you can take pride in your efforts.
I think you can be proud of your efforts.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
… Sophistry, that is. Meaningless encouragement… 
which tramples upon logic and reason…

I just noticed that she's not looking right. 
It looks like she started feeling unwell during her break…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
… This regimen may be a little excessive, but it has 
completed everything required for my development.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That is to say, this degree of malaise is within expectations. 
I'm taking the full day off today and will recover tomorrow.

… I can't feel an ounce of vigour in her words. 
Expecting a full recovery by tomorrow seems far-fetched…
choice_data_list: You should considering taking tomorrow off a—

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … Ridiculous!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
There is no plan where I do not run tomorrow. I worked hard 
to achieve the perfect result known as winning the race…!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Execute the plan without a single deviation and carry out 
the established procedures. If I can't… can't… do—
(Thud…)

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Everything will fall… into chaos ――
